metadata.synopsis: Lassandra's default dialogue at the bridge to Last Light while waiting for the player to speak to Jaheira.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. goto 59; 47; 1552. Go through the scene and kill the shadows3. Follow the harpers to haven4. Talk to Lassandra

0.speaker: Harper Lassandra
0.text: Go into the light - unless you fancy your chances in the shadows where we found you.

1.speaker: Harper Lassandra
1.text: Head on in. Our leader'll want a word.
